title: CAN'T CONNECT TO CHAT! HELP PLEASE
body:
keeps saying reconnect to chat.

I feel isolated from the world

I feel abandoned

I feel like I'm the only person in this world

HELP MEEEEE!!!!!! {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Issues connecting to chat can be caused by network issues, but there was also a patch last night that could have caused a short hiccup.  It sounds like everything is okay now.  Let me know if you still have issues with this!
I've got the same issue for my client. But its pissin' me off because my friend is in a Skype call with me and he has no issue at all with his client or chat so like ?? What's even going on
